response.overview: A new era has begun at Anfield.  As football's most famous stadium changes shape around them, Liverpool FC has a new leader, and a whole new philosophy.  Jurgen Klopp arrived at the club in October, and through his unique character and style helped steer the team to two major finals and some impressive Premier League performances 2015/16.  There were more great European nights at Anfield and many great goals from Sturridge, Coutinho, Firmino and Origi.  With highlights of every game, and every goal from the Premier League, Europa League, League Cup and FA Cup this is the complete record of the 2015/16 season - the start of a new era.
response.title: Liverpool F.C. - Official Season Review - 2015/16
